TopicTitle: Best way to upload a Fraps video of KSP to Youtube?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys i have a problem,

I'd like to upload a five minute Fraps video i took of me flying around in my first ever working space-plane, but the the last time i uploaded a video to Youtube it took five hours and it was only thirty seconds long! Is there a way i can upload video's faster? or do i simply have to grin and bear it?

Thank you for any answers received.
Use Windows Movie Maker. Thats what I use to upload videos.

Use Windows Movie Maker. Thats what I use to upload videos.

Ok i'l try that, thank you.
Don't forget to post the video on the Forums when its ready:)

Don't forget to post the video on the Forums when its ready:)

Thanks, i hope to

Fraps doesn't encode the video, so the files are huge. Try some recording software which encodes the files, such as Bandicam, and also try writing to an internal hard drive which will be much, much faster.

Thanks for the info Julie but I think they may have worked it out by now, the thread was last active May 2013

I better close this one, but a new tutorial thread on uploading would be useful.
